main event: An unidentified object was observed in the sky over Fair Oaks, California on May 4, 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as oval and red, resembling the size of a basketball., It had a rim that appeared to be spinning., The sighting lasted approximately 2 minutes., The observer reported seeing the object at an altitude of about 2000 feet., The object was silent and moved rapidly away before disappearing.
sighted object: an oval red object with a spinning rim
